Fault.name: C:\JDeveloper\mywork\SOA_Training\FileReadAndWrite\SOA\composite.xml
Fault.msg: Reference BPELProcess/Read_file does not exist as wire target

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpel:process> "BPELProcess" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "client:BPELProcessRequestMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "client:BPELProcessRequestMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "client:BPELProcessResponseMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "client:BPELProcessResponseMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "client:BPELProcess" is resolvable (check imports, value of "portType").
Fault.msg: "portType" is set to "client:BPELProcess" on this <bpel:receive> activity but it cannot be resolved (check value of "portType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Check the bpel:variable specified on this activity via attribute "variable" and make sure it is itself specified correctly.
Fault.msg: The activity <bpel:receive> refers to a bpel:variable (via the attribute "variable") - this bpel:variable needs to be defined correctly.

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns3:Books" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
